thread.title: XAwards by Hotjar – The Oscars For The Best Digital Experiences At The 'Early Startup' Stage.
thread.title_full: XAwards by Hotjar – The Oscars For The Best Digital Experiences At The 'Early Startup' Stage.

title: XAwards by Hotjar – The Oscars For The Best Digital Experiences At The 'Early Startup' Stage.
text: We've booked your spot for the 2017 XAwards! We'll be sending you an email with further instructions. The Oscars for the best Digital Experiences at the 'Early Startup' stage. Recognising the best web and native digital experiences at the 'early startup' stage. Your spot is booked. Book your spot now to compete in the XAwards. Book My Spot Bookings open until the 24th of March 2017. Building an app, site or other digital experience? Book your spot now in the 2017 XAwards to compete for 3 prestigious awards and €30,000 worth of cash prizes. Who's eligible? You are a team of at least 2 but not more than 5. You've built or you are in the process of building a digital experience (you have until the 31st of March 2017 to complete your project). You have created or creating an awesome experience. Your project is not making more than €5,000 in monthly revenue and has not raised more than €50,000 in capital. The Awards Best Overall Experience: €20,000 cash prize. Best Tech Achievement: €5,000 cash prize. Best Mobile App Experience: €5,000 cash prize. 5 finalist teams will receive a 100% fully funded trip to Malta to the final 2 day live event in May 2017 (flights and accommodation paid by Hotjar). 10 finalists receive a free 2 year Hotjar Business account and will be listed on the 2017 XAwards finalists page. Know someone that could be interested? or share with your friends: Awards Timeline Book your spot before the 24th of March. Submit a demo video by the 31st of March. 10 finalists will be announced on the 10th of April. Final winners will be announced at the live event in Malta – 11th - 12th of May. NOTE: 5 finalist teams will receive a fully funded trip to Malta. Villa Rosa in Malta – the venue where the XAwards live event be held in May 2017. 5 finalist teams will receive a fully funded 3-day trip to Malta. The Judges
